https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z7m4mgRQ9iGhNt1NuW6IZzk5rnO.jpg Yeong-soo marries Mi-ran to have a house. He wants to divorce Mi-ran when their marriage is not smooth due to poor compatibility. Yeong-soo tries to attack Mi-ran's employment through Se-ri's introduction, but Mi-ran finds out who Joon-ho is and makes a counterproposal to him. Joon-ho is going to attack Yeong-soo using another sex master, Mi-mi. Affair Is a Business
